entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023
